   Peer-to-Peer and Metalink, 2026-01-01-peer-to-peer-and-metalink, related
.. title: The Holy Bible
.. type: text
.. updated: 1611-01-01 0:00:00 UTC

This is a demonstration article for Rivista Voyager, and it includes Magnet
Links, and Metalink files of the 66 chapters of The Holy Bible.

This article was made to demonstrate the advantage of the Metalink framework, an
essential mean for data distribution, by its flexibility.

Whereas, unlike the metadata files of BitTorrent ("Metainfo"), people who
distribute both, The New Gospel and The Old Gospel, are able to share with those
who chose to download and distribute only one of each, or just Psalm, even
though the metadata files (Metalink) are different.

This is also a demonstration of mixing multiple systems (BitTorrent,
eDonkey2000, and Gnutella) in a single Magnet Link.

.. epigraph::

   Male and female created he them; and blessed them, and called their name
   Adam, in the day when they were created.

   -- Genesis 5:2 (KJV)

.. epigraph::

   For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that
   whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.


   -- John 3:16 (KJV)
